channel.title: Pastaghi Devlog - itch.io
channel.description: Are you the one to save them?

item.title: Pastaghi 1.0.2 update!
item.description: What's new in Pastaghi 1.0.2 ? The game is now available for Windows 32-bit. Lower health on monster you're battling. Visible progress on what mine shaft level you're on...

item.title: Pastaghi 1.0.1 update!
item.description: What's new in Pastaghi 1.0.1 ? Small flash on screen when the player gets hit. Buttons scale-up a bit when the cursor hovers over them. Small decrease of grain effect on post processing...
